member.name: T:Skyward.Popcorn.ExpandResultAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to ensure a result is always expanded

member.name: T:Skyward.Popcorn.DoNotExpandResultAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to ensure a result is never expanded

member.name: T:Skyward.Popcorn.PopcornExtensions
member.summary: Some useful extensions for Web App style configuration

member.name: M:Skyward.Popcorn.PopcornExtensions.UsePopcorn(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.MvcOptions,System.Action{Skyward.Popcorn.PopcornConfiguration})
member.summary: Configure the AspNet Core MVC options to include an Api Expander. Allow the caller to configure it with an action.
